bibl.title: Photograph of John J. Moran at the false site of Camp Lazear, Havana, Cuba [as determined by Philip Showalter Hench] 1940

div1.head: Photograph of John J. Moran at the false site of Camp Lazear, Havana, Cuba [as determined by Philip Showalter Hench] 1940
div1.p:
Moran tends the flamboyant
tree at the False Camp Lazear
note again the tree roots (1-2-3)
& the hollow (now a little smaller
between roots 2 & 3. Because of the
sign I could not obtain a
photo of these roots from exactly
the same angle as that in the
alvare - Recio photo (# 14)

Root # 1 in the Alvare - Recio
photo is now (14 years later) partially
covered with earth. But comparing
these roots and tree hollow with
the configuration of the branches
it is certain that the tree is the
same
